docs.lead_paragraph: Blue Cross and Blue Shield's national association said this week that half of its regional health insurance plans had formed an alliance to help big companies consolidate employee benefits under one roof. The association said it had developed the alliance, called Bluesconnect, because it believed national employers would rather cover their employees under one health care plan than through separate regional ones.

headline.main: Blue Cross Forms Alliance of Plans
